topic.title: Using Windows installer
topic.shortdesc: How to install the FusionInventory agent using Windows installer.

body.p: You must download the installer package from the following FusionInventory page:http://prebuilt.fusioninventory.org/stable/windows-i386/
You will just have to launch the installer for an interactive installation process.
body.note: The installer contains an embedded version of Perl dedicated to the FusionInventory agent, therefore no additional Perl installation is required. The embedded Perl doesn't conflict with another version that may be installed on your system.
If you plan on using the network discovery and the nmap feature, you will have to install the Windows-version of nmap. The latest version is available at: http://nmap.org/download.html.
